abstract: A.I.G., the troubled insurance giant, is working with JPMorgan Chase as it considers a possible plan to put billions of dollars of its most toxic assets into a separate company, The New York Post reported, citing undisclosed sources.
lead_paragraph: A.I.G., the troubled insurance giant, is working with JPMorgan Chase as it considers a possible plan to put billions of dollars of its most toxic assets into a separate company, The New York Post reported, citing undisclosed sources.

headline.main: A.I.G. Is Said to Consider Spin-off Strategy
